Text: We need the BAME report on COVID-19 now. We need to ensure ALL MPs can vote safely today. We need Boris Johnson to condemn Donald Trump in the strongest possible terms regardless of where this leaves a trade agreement. These 3 things are all absolutely crucial today

Following the decision to shelve the #BAME #Covid_19 inquiry report - limited in scope as it was - we're re-posting our studies on the UK https://t.co/7uQvcDAZ58 ; Scotland https://t.co/2RYjTaEXed which catalogue the racial dynamics central to the disproportionality. Please share
I think we may have to account for the distinct possibility that the people who sounded the most apocalyptic about Trump were not being hysterical - they were right.

Q.  What do The Bible and The Mueller Report have in common?A.  If you've actually read the 2nd half of either, you can't support Trump.#DictatorTrump #AmericaOrTrump #BlackLiveMattters #BLACK_LIVES_MATTER

.@WHO already has staff in Mbandaka, #DRC supporting the new #Ebola outbreak response.This outbreak is a reminder that #COVID19 is not the only health threat people face. WHO is continuing to monitor ; respond to many health emergencies.

Today Trump declared war on the people of the United States, threatening states that if the did not request federal troops in their states, the troops would be deployed forcibly.  That's illegal, and it would invoke a civil war.

What is happening to #Italy?Climate change is happening... but do you really know to what extentRecently, Italy mandated 33 hours of compulsory #ClimateChange and sustainability education in schools per year This is a great precedent#Tiredearth #COVID19https://t.co/YDL48olLPy
